name: Security Scoring
description: Scoring template for Security super-sector patents. Includes threat coverage and attack sophistication metrics.

questions.question: How comprehensive is this patent's coverage of security threats? Consider attack vectors, defensive mechanisms, and breadth of protection.
questions.reasoningPrompt: Describe the security threats addressed and coverage gaps.

questions.question: Rate the sophistication of attacks this patent helps prevent or detect. Consider APT, zero-day, and multi-stage attack scenarios.
questions.reasoningPrompt: Describe the attack sophistication level addressed.

questions.question: How well does this patent align with security standards and frameworks (NIST, ISO 27001, CIS, etc.)?
questions.reasoningPrompt: Identify relevant security standards and compliance frameworks.
